parameters.name: RowIndex
parameters.description: Row in the BOM table where to get the number of components; 0-based index

parameters.name: Configuration
parameters.description: Configuration for which to count components in top-level only BOMs; specify an empty string for parts only and indented BOMs

parameters.name: ItemNumber
parameters.description: Item number of the specified row

parameters.name: PartNumber
parameters.description: Part number of the specified row

title: IBomTableAnnotation.GetComponentsCount2
description: Gets the number of components, the item number, and the part number in the specified row for the specified configuration in this BOM table annotation.
signature:
System.Int32 GetComponentsCount2( 
   System.Int32
RowIndex
,
   System.String
Configuration
,
   out System.String
ItemNumber
,
   out System.String
PartNumber
)

parameters.name: RowIndex
parameters.description: Row in the BOM table where to get the number of components; 0-based index

parameters.name: Configuration
parameters.description: Configuration for which to count components in top-level only BOMs; specify an empty string for parts only and indented BOMs

parameters.name: ItemNumber
parameters.description: Item number of the specified row

parameters.name: PartNumber
parameters.description: Part number of the specified row

returns: Number of components in the specified row for the specified configuration
remarks:
Call this method before calling
IBomTableAnnotation::IGetComponents2
to determine the size of the array for that method.
